title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword
notes: Installation, movie intro and five minutes of gameplay work perfectly

title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword
notes: Didn't try to install mods or play for very long

title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword
notes:
Had a wierd blackout on the map building Stonehenge. Fixed by save-loading.

Oh, and Isabella's still not a friendly person.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword
notes: Two error messages keep popping up when the game tries to load its files.  Both are related to being unable to load XML files.  You need to install MS XML Core Services 3.0 (msxml3) through winetricks in order to solve the errors and make the game start properly.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Beyond The Sword
notes: The enemy AI seems overly hostile, but that could be just me sucking.

Often crashes on starting.  I had best luck doing a "play now" and then loading the game from there,  Works fine up until I discover Calendar, at which point the map is all black, so the game is basically unplayable.
title: Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 520 (Skylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: The game crashes when loading a save file normally. The solution is to start a new game and load from there. There are also some random blackouts that can be fixed by reloading the game.

title: Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword

notes: Seems to work fine, all buttons and labels are using XML names, not user-friendly.  This is probably missing an XML library and other tweaks might work but it is mostly unplayable out of the box.
